Description: This corpus contains blog posts.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from  LINDAT.
This corpus contains tweets, chats and SMS from 2005 to 2012.#SEPThe corpus is available for searching online through the OpenSONAR environment.

Corpus: DIDI – The DiDi corpus of South Tyrolean CMC 1.0.0
Description: This corpus consists of Facebook posts gathered from 136 Facebook users from South Tyrol. All texts are anonymised.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from Eurac repository

This corpus contains chat room messages, forum posts and news comments from 2000 to 2008#SEPThe corpus is available for download from dedicated webpage associated with CLARIN Estonia and through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains forum posts from the Suomi24 website from 2001 to 2016.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the FIN-CLARIN repository and through the concordancer Korp.
This corpus contains e-mails, forum posts, online chats, tweets and SMS.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from Ortolang.
This corpus contains online chats from 2000 to 2006#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the repository of CLARIN-D
This corpus contains forum posts from portals delfi.lt and lrytas.lt from 2010 to 2014.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN-LT repository.

Corpus: Blog post and comment corpus Janes-Blog 1.0
Description: This corpus contains blog posts from RTV Slovenija and Publishwall.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Slovenian repository CLARIN.SI and can be queried through KonText

This corpus contains forum posts from Avtomobilizem.com, MedOver.net and RTV Slovenija.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Slovenian repository CLARIN.SI and can be queried through KonText.
This corpus contains news comments from RTV Slovenija, Mladina and Reporter.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Slovenian repository CLARIN.SI and can be queried through KonText.
This corpus contains tweets written by Slovenian Twitter users from 2013 to 2017.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Slovenian repository CLARIN.SI and can be queried through KonText.
This corpus contains Slovenian Wikipedia user and talk pages.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Slovenian repository CLARIN.SI and can be queried through KonText.
